[[Shino]] releases hundreds of thousands of [[kikaichū]] from his body into the air. On his command, the insects attack the opponent in five waves. They then coalesce into a large cloud and rain down on the opponent, and then the insects form a giant meteor-like insect sphere crashing down on the opponent.

[[pl:Kikaichū: Arare]]
